subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott shot a 10-under-par 62 in the second round of the Memorial yesterday to take a one-shot lead over Rod Pampling at Muirfield Village in Dublin, Ohio.
snippet: Adam Scott shot a 10-under-par 62 in the second round of the Memorial yesterday to take a one-shot lead over Rod Pampling at Muirfield Village in Dublin, Ohio.
